turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What sizes does the cups come in?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The sizes are venti, grande, trenta.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Do they have whole milk that I can add?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes starbucks does have whole milk.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to add mocha flavoring, is that possible?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes Starbucks has mocha flavor that you can add.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to add 2 sugar to my coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes you can add 2 packs of sugar.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Is there honey available?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes they do have honey available.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like them to add whipped cream if possible?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes they will add whipped cream to your coffee.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Is there a sleeve that I can add to the cup?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes Starbucks has sleeves available for your drink.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Is there a straw?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes you can get a straw with the coffee.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How long will it take?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The coffee should be done fairly quickly typically around 5 to 10 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order from the starbucks on lake mead. My drink will be a grande coffee with mocha flavor and whipped cream on the top.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I have placed your coffee order for the Starbucks on Lake Mead and it will be ready for pickup shortly and I have sent your receipt to your mobile device via text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.
